Package org.pdp.view

Class GridMainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.pdp.view.GridMainWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, IGameMainView
    public class GridMainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements IGameMainView
    This class represents the main game view. It has a grid that shows the dungeon and an information panel for information about the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      GridMainWindow​(IDungeonReadOnly dungeon)
